g.text: 1020(N) vs 511(H) “Storm in Toronto” event Thread AIt poured so hard in Toronto that rain fell inside the Eaton Centre. Shoppers inside Eaton Centre found themselves in the middle of a rainstorm amid a severe thunderstorm warning for Toronto and surrounding regions Wednesday afternoon.1.Short, intense storm causes power outages and property damage across Toronto. Toronto was under a severe thunderstorm warning for part of Wednesday afternoon.1.1 Around 1,900 customers still without power after short, intense storm in Toronto: hydro. As of 5 a.m. Thursday, Toronto Hydro said around 2,100 customers were still without power. It isn't clear when power will be restored.2.Toronto rainstorm causes flooding in Eaton Centre. The Eaton Centre felt the effects of Wednesday's severe rainstorm as water began pouring from the ceiling during the storm.Thread B1.Areas near Colorado Springs see worst overnight hail stormin more than 20 years, according to report. Thousands of houses and cars were damaged early Wednesday by large hail during the worst overnight storm in El Paso County in more than 20 years. 2.It poured so hard in Toronto that rain fell inside the Eaton Centre. Shoppers inside Eaton Centre found themselves in the middle of a rainstorm amid a severe thunderstorm warning for Toronto and surrounding regions Wednesday afternoon.3.Short, intense storm causes power outages and property damage across Toronto. Toronto was under a severe thunderstorm warning for part of Wednesday afternoon.4.Toronto rainstorm causes flooding in Eaton Centre. The Eaton Centre felt the effects of Wednesday's severe rainstorm as water began pouring from the ceiling during the storm.
